title: SIOS to Share Windows Azure High Availability Options for SQL Server at Pass Summit 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 8:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: SIOS Technology 
SAN MATEO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/22/15 -- SIOS Technology Corp . ( www.us.sios.com ), the industry's leading provider of high availability and IT analytics software, today announced that Microsoft Cluster MVP and SIOS Technical Evangelist Dave Bermingham will discuss Windows Azure High Availability options for SQL Server at Pass Summit 2015 October 27-30 in Seattle, WA at the Washington State Convention Center. SIOS will also showcase its SAN and SANLess clustering software in Booth 501, host "Pass the Bacon: Breakfast Panel" and sponsor "Denny Cherry presents SQL Karaoke." 
Speaking Session Titled, "Understanding Windows Azure High Availability options for SQL Server," Dave's session is scheduled for Friday, Oct 30, 3:30 PM. Windows Azure provides an excellent IaaS platform for deploying SQL Server. Although Microsoft is managing the infrastructure, high availability and disaster recovery must still be addressed. In this session, attendees will learn how to leverage Azure Fault Domains, Upgrade Domains and Internal Load Balancers to ensure the high availability of SQL Server deployments within the Azure cloud. SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups and Failover Cluster Instances deployed in Azure have specific requirements that will be discussed in detail and further illustrated through live demonstrations that will include configuration via both Powershell and the Azure Portal. Hybrid cloud configurations will also be introduced as a disaster recovery solution for SQL Server deployments. On-premise to cloud, cloud to cloud and inter-cloud options will be demonstrated and the benefits of each configuration will be discussed. 
The SIOS Exhibit In booth #501, SIOS will showcase its products that add real-time block level replication and configuration flexibility in Windows Server Failover Clustering environments. SIOS DataKeeper Cluster Edition software is an ingredient that integrates seamlessly with Windows Server Failover Clustering (WSFC) to provide SANLess cluster protection where shared storage clusters are either impossible or impractical, such as cloud, virtual and high performance storage environments. View a demonstration and enter to win a Go Pro camera. 
PASS the Bacon: SQL Server Experts and MVPs Breakfast Panel SIOS is sponsoring the PASS the Bacon breakfast at PASS Summit 2015, which will be held on Friday, October 30 at 6:45 AM and will feature an interactive panel discussion with three SQL Server experts and MVPs about a variety of real-world strategies for achieving cost-efficient high performance and high availability in SQL Server. Topics include: Leveraging flash storage in database scenarios for more than performance; Comparing and contrasting flash storage options in the market for in-server, caching and array based solutions; Using flash storage with existing products effectively; and Creating a SANLess cluster for high performance and high availability in a cost-saving solution. Register here to attend. 
Denny Cherry Presents SQL Karaoke SIOS is also sponsoring "Denny Cherry presents SQL Karaoke" on Tuesday, October 27, 9:30pm - 2:00am at Cowgirls Inc., 421 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98104. Registration is mandatory for SQL Karaoke. Register here .
